entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FlowDirection not updating on iOS when switching languages in .NET MAUI Shell #29358
  • [perf] consider compiling AppThemeBindingExtension for NET9 #29356
  • [testing] UITEsts pipeline doesn t respect UseProvisionator #29355
    Backlog
  • [.NET10] CLI - Running Windows publish command would result in an error. #29350
  • [.NET10]The details page of any recipe in the "WhatToEat" sample project cannot be clicked #29349
  • [.NET10] CLI - MAUI Sample App failed to deploy on Windows with error: "The command xxx exited with code -1073741189." #29347
  • [iOS] App crashes when navigating to a page containing a map more than once #29346
  • Unable to determine if a Map Pin on the Map component has become invisible or not rendered due to its physical proximity to another pin at a given zoom level #29342

Closed

  • I1_Vertical_list_for_Multiple_Rows - Rotating the emulator would cause text to overflow. #29287
  • [Android][Label] Setting a Label visible after having had focus on a InputView will increase the Label's height #29194
    .NET 9 SR7
  • MAUI: coping a file to a dir on a IOS simulator #29348

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "[Android][NET 10] Fix: Ensure Image consumes touches properly #29363
    community ✨
  • Run Categories Separately #29362
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 10 #29360
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [main] Add the ability to intercept web requests #29359
  • [iOS] Fix for FlyoutItemImageStyle breaks selection of first item on startup. #29345
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-flyout, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix fo setting an Entry's Keyboard to Date causes it to be interpreted as a password input #29344
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for [Windows] HorizontalScrollBarVisibility="Never" not working in CarouselView on Windows platform #29343
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [Android] Fixed Setting a Label visible after having had focus on a InputView will increase the Label's height #29210
    p/0, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr6] [Android] Fixed Setting a Label visible after having had focus on a InputView will increase the Label's height #29357
  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 29335 - [2025/05/12] Candidate #29352
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Updated

  • Add the ability to intercept all web resource requests #28876
    area-controls-webview, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [NET10] Replace the obsolete RunJavaScriptTextInputPanel #28531
    proposal/open, area-blazor, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Android Libraries Ecosystem Updates 20250502 #29331
  • [.NET 10] Add "Open/Close" API to picker controls #29323
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-datetimepicker, area-controls-picker
  • [tests] Add coreclr test for SF sample #29327
    area-testing
  • [Android] Button with corner radius shadow broken on Android device - fix #29339
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [ci] try do full build on dnceng #27456
    area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] Fix for Assigning null to the SelectedItem of the CollectionView in the SelectionChanged event does not clear the selection #29288
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix -[iOS] - CarouselView Throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException Immediately on Application Launch in CV2 #29316
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] - Fix Inconsistent Footer Scrolling Behaviour in CollectionView with EmptyView #28107
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android & iOS]Fix: GestureRecognizer Prevents Focus & User Interaction on Input Controls #28124
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • Fix ImageButton not rendering correctly based on its bounds #28309
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for RadioButton BorderColor and BorderWidth not updated at runtime #28335
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion
  • [MacOS] Fixed NullReferenceException when using ImagePaint #28726
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-image, partner/syncfusion
  • [2025/05/12] Candidate - In Flight Branch #29335
  • Changes in provisioning to fix fails installing Appium on Linux #29105
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Android] Fixed incorrect tab content display in TabbedPage #27294
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Optimize JS escaping #27528
    community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView ItemsSource Feature #29322
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar Black Background Issue When Setting Transparent Background #29225
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselView proper bounce-back behavior when Loop=false #29318
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Update failing CarouselView2 tests to use CarouselView1 in sample #29315
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • Fixed Label text cropping when a width request is specified on the label inside a VerticalStackLayout with specified with request #29166
    community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Implemented the Resize and Downsize functions in the W2DImage class #29138
    platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed the color not being applied to the Expand/Collapse Chevron icon #29140
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed issue where group Header/Footer template was set to all items when IsGrouped was true for an ObservableCollection #29144
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for ItemSpacing value being retained when re-entering CollectionView with ItemsLayout set to vertical or horizontal list after navigating back. #29190
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed TransformProperties issue when a wrapper view is present #29228
    area-animation, platform/android 🤖, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] - Fix Custom FlyoutIcon from Being Overridden to Default Color in Shell #27580
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • Make sure to use the override implementation of PopViewController on NavigationRenderer #29330
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fixed Shell flyout background image does not displayed #28977
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Recover the uitest-build task on Android cake #28452
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
